title: Octopus Project typeface
content:
I would love to know what typeface “The Octopus Project” is set in. Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163226im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/octopus_project_4854.jpg)

 [‹ Team Hydro Green font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49736 "Go to previous forum topic") ["james gang rides again" Thick, Curvy Sans--please ID! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163226/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49698 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Elliott Walker

comments.content: The lack of kerning seems to suggest its probably a free font; possibly an altered version of some commercial font though.

Hi Elliott

Agree, I also loved to know. Looks very interesting.

It is ’Solstice’, designed for T-26.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/solstice/solstice/charmap.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201163226/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/solstice/solstice/charmap.html)

Welcome -

Best Regards,

Steffen
